thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Fannie Mae to Require $3.7 Billion Government Cash Infusion

author: Austen Hufford
title: Fannie Mae to Require $3.7 Billion Government Cash Infusion

organizations.name: billion government cash infusion fannie mae

text:
Fannie Mae reported a net loss of $6.5 billion for the fourth quarter, triggering what is expected to be the first taxpayer-funded infusion for the mortgage-finance giant in six years.
The quarterly loss was due to a one-time accounting charge due to the reduction in the corporate tax rate. But Fannie, which has been under government conservatorship since the financial crisis, said Wednesday that its regulator, the Federal Housing Finance Agency, would seek a fresh taxpayer infusion of $3.7 billion from the Treasury Department...
